definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: In this study, effect of cyclic load on the vacuum tightness of the adhesively bonded joint was investigated experimentally.
sentences.chinese: 該文實驗研究了循環載荷對粘接接頭氣密性的影響。

sentences.english: Examine the airproof of the connection between filter and the stove.
sentences.chinese: 檢查淨化器與竈具之間連接的氣密性。

sentences.english: The improved test method is to drill the hole on the cap. New method is much simple, and the hole can be easily sealed.
sentences.chinese: 文章提出了在桶蓋上鑽孔進行液壓和氣密試驗的方法。

sentences.english: The upper part can be connected to the lower part in order to form a gas-tight interior.
sentences.chinese: 所述上部件可連接到下部件，以形成氣密的內部。

sentences.english: High conductivity and gas tightness are the basic requirements for bipolar plate materials.
sentences.chinese: 高電導和氣密性是雙極板材料需有的基本性能。

sentences.english: Making the building air tight means doing things different from traditional techniques.
sentences.chinese: 使建築氣密性是指從傳統的技術做不同的事情。

sentences.english: The airtight steel shell is formed by alignment welding the H shaped steel.
sentences.chinese: 所述氣密鋼殼採用H型鋼排列焊接而成。

sentences.english: So that you can feel its tightness.
sentences.chinese: 這樣您就可以感受到它的氣密性。

sentences.english: The 10-pin hermetic power package is adopted.
sentences.chinese: 電路的封裝形式爲10腳雙列直插金屬氣密封裝。

sentences.english: Once heat is applied, it shrinks again, creating an air-tight, durable wrapping.
sentences.chinese: 一俟加熱，它再次收縮，形成一個氣密而耐用的包裝。

sentences.english: Two desiccant bags are delivered in an air-tight package.
sentences.chinese: 氣密性包裝有兩個乾燥劑袋。

sentences.english: The sealed products behave good vacuum-tight properties under long-period examinations.
sentences.chinese: 經多年使用表明，封接件具有良好的真空氣密性能。

sentences.english: The forces necessary for flight are directly related to air density.
sentences.chinese: 飛行所需要的動力直接關係與空氣密度。

sentences.english: X5.6.3 While the hose remains in the inlet valve, check the other inlets for air tightness.
sentences.chinese: 當軟管仍在進氣閥中時，檢查另一個進氣閥的氣密性。
